alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 30 at 2:35AM MDT until March 31 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CDT /8 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, and Davis. * WHEN...From 9 AM CDT /8 AM MDT/ this morning to 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
